congVote.dailyDigestSummary: <P/>By 94 yeas to 1 nay (Vote No. 187), Senate passed H.R. 2430, to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to revise and extend the user-fee programs for prescription drugs, medical devices, generic drugs, and biosimilar biological products, after agreeing to the motion to proceed.
